content: this sock is inspired by the movie *the village* by m night shyamalan the all-over lace pattern on the front of the sock is reminiscent of autumn leaves falling in the woods the lace and cable motif on the back of the sock represents the forbidden red berries this is a toe-up sock pattern knit using magic loop one small circular needle or two circular needles this sock is part of super sock scarefest 2024 the pattern will be released to the general public in november materials 420-450 yds of fingering weight yarn us size 1 knitting needles cable needle
